messages.title: Get Brexit Done
messages.content: Broxtowe's vote to leave has been ignored by our current MP. Only the Conservatives can get Brexit done - so we can invest in our NHS, schools and police.

messages.title: Protect our local environment
messages.content: Let's make the most of Broxtowe's green corridors for cycle routes. Encouraging cleaner and greener communities and options for commuters.

messages.title: Support investment into the Queens Medical Centre
messages.content: Our NHS is vitally important to all of us. We need more front-line investment, so our local hospitals are fit for purpose for patients and staff alike.

messages.title: Investing in our High Streets
messages.content: Securing our fair share from the Government's Towns Fund initiative - to regenerate Stapleford Town Centre and boost our local businesses in Broxtowe.

messages.title: More funding for schools
messages.content: Our children and grandchildren deserve the best education possible – including better apprenticeships.

messages.title: Tackling crime and anti-social behaviour
messages.content: Securing Broxtowe’s fair share of the 20,000 extra police officers we’ll recruit. We need more police on the beat to keep our streets safe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Conservatives can get Brexit done, so we can invest in our NHS, schools, and police.
Encouraging cleaner and greener communities and options for commuters by optimizing Broxtowe's green corridors for cycle routes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support investment into the Queens Medical Centre
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocating for front-line investment in local hospitals to ensure they are fit for patients and staff.
Securing funds to regenerate Stapleford Town Centre and boost local businesses.
Ensuring better education and apprenticeship opportunities for children and grandchildren.
Recruiting 20,000 extra police officers to keep the streets safe.
